Title: 39539 - # Tips for Hosting a Backyard Party
Direction: 500 Words. List 3-6 different tips for hosting a backyard party. Discuss things like food & cocktail recipes, decorating tips, and fun activities that you could do with your guests. You can place your target URL when discussing decorating tips, as strung lights are currently a very popular outdoor décor staple. Your target audience is women over the age of 25 who are interested in food, drinks and entertainment.

Title: 39540 - Making the Most of a Small Backyard
Direction: 500 Words. List 3-6 ways that someone could make the most out of their small backyard. Discuss tips like decorating with string lights, building a vertical herb garden, or getting outdoor furniture that is easily move-able or fold-able, etc. Your target audience is people with small outdoor spaces. You can include your target URL in the section where you discuss decorating with string lights.
